title: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character in the first line is replaced with spaces so that the two lines are visually indented the same, executing the ShiftLeft command results in the text moving. In the first scenario, it seems like the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character, i.e., get rid of the tab. It is also observed that there is confusion when there is a stray space, as the user doesn't understand why the text won't shift.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a default text editor
2. Type in the following:
   - Space
   - Tab
   - Some text
   - Tab
   - Some text 2
3. Highlight the two lines above
4. Execute the ShiftLeft command
5. Notice that nothing moves
